mapper.select: select no, title, (@row := @row + 1) as `row`, (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(latitude)) * cos(radians(longitude) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(latitude)))) as distance from attractions, (select @row := #{cursorId}) as init order by distance, title limit #{cursorId}, 5
